name: cooperatively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows you are willing to help or do what people ask: He testified fully and cooperatively. I was surprised that the children posed so cooperatively for the photo.
together with other people, all helping each other: The students were working cooperatively on a problem. In only very few mammal species do males and females pair off and raise offspring cooperatively.
More examplesFewer examplesThey should try to resolve their differences more cooperatively. The brothers acted cooperatively over the division of their father's money.I look forward to working cooperatively with the General Assembly.I hope we can join together cooperatively. You can work either competitively or cooperatively as you choose.
